metadata.title: CVE-2022-40738 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Bento4 through 1.6.0-639. A NULL pointerdereference occurs in AP4_DescriptorListWriter::Action inCore/Ap4Descriptor.h, called from AP4_EsDescriptor::WriteFields andAP4_Expandable::Write.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
